trans-unit.source: Determines the action that occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Data.DataSet.AcceptChanges" /> or <see cref="M:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges" /> method is invoked on a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> with a <see cref="T:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷在具有 <see cref="T:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 上叫用 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataSet.AcceptChanges" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges" /> 方法時會發生的動作。

trans-unit.source: Changes to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> are not final until you call the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref:System.Data.DataTable>之前您呼叫不是最終<xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When either <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A> is called on a row in the parent table, the <xref:System.Data.AcceptRejectRule> value determines whether or not changes are propagated to corresponding rows in the child table.
trans-unit.target: 當 <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RejectChanges%2A>父資料表中的資料列上呼叫<xref:System.Data.AcceptRejectRule>值會決定是否要將變更傳播到子資料表中對應資料列。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>, sets various of its properties, including the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint.AcceptRejectRule%2A>, and adds it to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>，設定各種屬性，並包括<xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint.AcceptRejectRule%2A>，並將它加入<xref:System.Data.DataTable>物件的<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Changes are cascaded across the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 跨越關聯性來串聯變更。
未發生任何動作 (預設值)。
